page.title: 16OLD PEOPLE IN EAST MERSEA
page.content: { A RETIRED FARMING COUPLE} They were born in Australia and came to live in East Mersea 50 years ago. They came to work on a farm bought by his father.They were surprised by the peace and quiet when they first arrived,but gradually they have grown to cherish this aspect of East Mersea. In the 1930's when they moved in there was no electricity,no water and no transport to the local town. Farming was hard work as there was no machinery. Horses were used for ploughing and transport. Their lifestyle has improved. They own a car, shop in Colchester, arrange for large items to be delivered and have a very comfortable home. They regret the loss of many friends, but they still enjoy life in the local community. They attend church in Colchester and enjoy Whist_drives.
